dict.acceptation: 分析家，化验员；〈美〉精神病医师；

sent.orig: Thirdly, why does the part cast an analyst to always do not value Alibaba?
sent.trans: 其三，部分投行分析师为何总不看好阿里巴巴？

sent.orig: GE fourth-quarter adjusted earnings per share of 37 cents, with the average Wall Street analyst expectations.
sent.trans: 通用电气第四季度调整后每股收益为37美分，与华尔街分析师的平均预期相符。

sent.orig: The systems analyst frequently acts as a consultant to a business.
sent.trans: 系统分析员经常充当顾问业务。

sent.orig: An American analyst tries to find out why box office receipts are going down.
sent.trans: 美一分析家试图找出电影票房收入每况愈下的原因。

sent.orig: The three primary roles of the systems analyst are as consultant, supporting expert, and change agent.
sent.trans: 这三个主要作用是为系统分析员顾问，支持专家和变革推动者。
